description: One of the Four Emperor crews led by Edward Newgate (Whitebeard), known for their family-like bonds and immense power.

keyMoments.title: Commanders Systematically Wounded
keyMoments.description: The Admirals coordinate their attacks to severely wound Marco and freeze Jozu, decimating the crew's top commanders in rapid succession.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a devastating turning point in the war as the Whitebeard Pirates lose their strongest defenders.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Shows Vulnerability
keyMoments.description: Captain Whitebeard falters from age and injuries, revealing his mortality to his crew and enemies alike.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even the world's strongest pirate crew faces the reality of their captain's aging and the generational shift.

keyMoments.title: Allied Pirates Defeat Pacifistas
keyMoments.description: The Whitebeard Pirates and their allied crews successfully destroy multiple Pacifistas and continue pushing toward the execution platform.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the collective strength and determination of the crew despite suffering major losses.

flagSymbol: Whitebeard's jolly roger with a white mustache

description: The World Government's military sea force tasked with maintaining law and order across the seas and combating piracy.

keyMoments.title: Admirals Coordinate Strategic Assault
keyMoments.description: The three Admirals work in perfect coordination to exploit weaknesses in the Whitebeard Pirates' defense, systematically eliminating their commanders.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the Marines' superior strategic coordination and the effectiveness of their top-tier combat forces.

keyMoments.title: Replacement Executioners Prepared
keyMoments.description: Fleet Admiral Sengoku orders replacement executioners for Ace's execution, showing the Marines' unwavering commitment to their plan.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the institutional determination of the Marines to execute justice as they see it.
